```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
library(gridExtra)
```

## general analysis

```{r}
bothmortality <- filter(AllMortality, sex_id == 3) 
bothmortality %>% ggplot(aes(cause_id)) %>%
  geom_histogram()

p2 <- ggplot(data = bothmortality, aes(cause_id, year_id)) 
p2 + geom_point()

mort2010 <- filter(bothmortality, year_id == 2010)
p1 <- ggplot(data = mort2010, aes(cause_id))
p1 + geom_histogram()
```
